channel.title: How to make an awesome tasting pp!
channel.description:
Ingredients: Mint cookies An pp
1.) Take a mint cookie and eat 1/3 of it at a time, and gurgle it in your spit. 2.) Take a bite of the pp (or more if the mint flavor lasts) 3.) Repeat until da pp is finished 4.) Enjoy!
[size=1pt]Lawl told me too.[/size]

item.title: How to make an awesome tasting pp!
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

Human Smegma

Both males and females produce smegma. In males, smegma is produced and accumulates under the foreskin; in females it collects around the clitoris and in the folds of the labia minora.

Smegma is invisible, noticeable as a smooth or moist texture until it is allowed to accumulate, when it takes on its characteristic texture and appearance described in many texts as “cheesy”. Since smegma tends to accumulate under the foreskin in males, its presence is less common and less noticeable in circumcised males.

The subpreputial moisture keeps the glans moist and may lubricate the movement of the foreskin. However, if allowed to accumulate and decay in the foreskin cavity it can provide an ideal medium for potentially pathogenic bacteria to colonise[2]; current medical opinion is that allowing smegma to accumulate freely is unhealthy. Accumulation of smegma can cause or aggravate a variety of irritations known as balanitis. Early medical studies such as those by Plaut, and Heins (1958) claimed that smegma accumulation led to the development of penile cancer, but more recent studies have disagreed [3].

Preventing accumulation is best done by rinsing the area with warm water. In females, the hood of the clitoris can be gently pulled back to wash away accumulated smegma. Some argue that soap is best avoided because it depletes natural skin oils and may cause non-specific dermatitis [4]. In addition, vaginal deodorants that are sometimes used to combat unwanted odors can be harmful, as they tend to upset the normal balance of bacteria in the vaginal cavity. This can in turn upset the pH of the vagina [5]. Noticeably unpleasant odours can be an indicator of a potentially serious medical problem, and deodorant sprays or washes may hide this condition.

Smegma has become part of the pro- and anti-circumcision movements, with those in favor of routine infant circumcisions citing improved hygiene by avoiding odorous or harmful buildup, and those opposed citing the usefulness of smegma, which is generally lost to circumcisions. Medical opinion is split on the matter.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make an awesome tasting pp!

item.title: How to make an awesome tasting pp!
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

ilyaostr9:

try smeg with crackers. Yummy…

We should make a smeg cook book…

Oh and try smeg sandwiches… you need enough to cover 2 slices of bread so ask your family for some help… a variety of smeg really tingles the taste buds.

Read full topic

mb u shud put smeg on da appl den it taste btr?

Thanks, now my stomach is quesy. I have to say that smegma is quite possibly the most disgusting thing. Glad I’m circumsized.
[/quote]how would you now how disgusting it is if you dont have any >_>

Lets see… Dead skin, dried up piss, etc. All stuck to your penis… Also known as dick cheese.

its not dead skin. its gud cheese, taste gud with appl u no[/quote]
You made me dribble
